actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to raise the value limit for personal articles which may be imported duty free by returning residents.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to increase the value limit for personal articles which may be imported duty-free by residents returning from American Samoa, Guam, or the Virgin Islands.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to raise the value limit for personal articles which may be imported duty free by returning residents.
